text:
[Verse]
Golden rays they paint the sky
Colors change just like a sigh
Feathers float as birds fly high
Watching day wave its goodbye

[Verse 2]
Shadows grow as stars appear
Moonlight whispers in my ear
Night's embrace it feels so near
Drawing close without a fear

[Chorus]
Sunset sky oh how you glow
End of day a gentle show
Crimson clouds they softly flow
Nighttime comes but you still glow

[Verse 3]
Twilight steals the light away
Nighttime creatures come to play
Day's last breath begins to sway
Dreams take flight no need to stay

[Bridge]
Magic in the evening light
Waves of warmth that fade from sight
Hold on tight to moments bright
Day to night then back to light

[Chorus]
Sunset sky oh how you glow
End of day a gentle show
Crimson clouds they softly flow
Nighttime comes but you still glow
title: Sunset Sky
